==Walkthrough==
# Go south and jump down into the lower floor.
# Go to the eastern end and use Tartaglia's charged shot to activate the {{Color|Hydro}} [[Elemental Monument]]. When the water level rises, swim south to get onto the stairs.
#* There is a [[Common Chest]] on a platform at the southern end.
# Go up the stairs and defeat the enemies. {{Enemy List|Large Pyro Slime*2;Pyro Slime*6}}
# Use Tartaglia's charged shots to activate the 3 Hydro Elemental Monuments.
# Interact with the device to start a dialogue scene.
# Go down the stairs to the east and activate the [[Door of Resurrection]].
#* There is a [[Common Chest]] right next to it.
# Go southeast and jump down the platform and defeat the enemies.
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Large Electro Slime*3}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Large Electro Slime*2;Electro Slime*2;Large Pyro Slime}}
# Go north across the water to start a dialogue scene.
#* To the east of the water, there is a [[Common Chest]] covered by a [[Spider]] web and protected by {{Enemy|Large Pyro Slime|x=1}} and {{Enemy|Pyro Slime|x=2}}.
# Go through the door into a room with lasers.
# Go pass the first laser when the inactive Ruin Guard is being moved across the laser. Alternatively, the laser can also be dodged across.
#* Glide east to the platform. There is an [[Exquisite Chest]] here.
# Wait for another Ruin Guard and go pass the second laser.
# Glide west back to the other platform.
# Wait for another Ruin Guard and go pass the third laser.
# Go down the stairs and use Tartaglia's charged shot to shoot at the Electro device high up on the wall to start a dialogue scene.
# Survive the {{Enemy|Ruin Guard|text=Ruin Guards}} for 60 seconds to start a cutscene.
# Go pass the destroyed Ruin Guards to find Tartaglia at the northwest corner.
# Talk to Teucer to pass him the [[Mr. Cyclops Action Figure]].
# Open the [[Precious Chest]] in front of the exit.

==Notes==
* During the "''Eliminate the Ruin Guard threat''" step, it is not required to defeat all the Ruin Guards. However, the party '''and''' Tartaglia must survive for 60 seconds. Otherwise, the step is restarted.
* There will be additional Ruin Guards appearing in the arena as the time passes.
